mapper.select: select user_id, top1, top2, top3, top4, top5, top6, top7, top8, top9, top10 from movie_top_table where user_id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into movie_top_table (user_id, top1, top2, top3, top4, top5, top6, top7, top8, top9, top10) values (#{user_id},#{top1},#{top2},#{top3},#{top4},#{top5},#{top6},#{top7},#{top8},#{top9},#{top10}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_id = values(user_id), top1 = values(top1), top2 = values(top2), top3 = values(top3), top4 = values(top4), top5 = values(top5), top6 = values(top6), top7 = values(top7), top8 = values(top8), top9 = values(top9), top10 = values(top10);
